comment: Enjoyed this so much and now it's a favorite.  Nose was glorious and the flavor didn't let down at all.  Nose had notes of Rye, touch of Dill, but more cinnamon and red berries. What I perceived as raspberry in both Aroma and flavor.  There was awesome depth to the flavor that was both raspberry and cinnamon with some nice spice notes.  This was a nice journey through the glass.  I will seek this out again.
